## 4



```{r gamma inversa previa posterior, echo=FALSE}

 library(invgamma)
 set.seed(1234)

lambda <- seq(0.005, 1, length = 1000)
plot(NA, NA, xlim = c(0.1,0.2),ylim = c(0,4*(10^-34)),  xlab = expression(lambda), ylab = "densidad", main = "Posterior")
lines(lambda, dinvgamma(lambda,33/4 , scale = 33625), col = 2, lwd = 2)
lines(lambda, dinvgamma(lambda,33/4 + 14, scale = 33625 +70612 ), col = 4, lwd = 2)
abline(h = 0, col = 1)
legend("topright", legend = c( "Previa" , "posterior"), bty = "n", lwd = 2, col = c(2, 4))
```
